<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Limited">[Surge Investigator](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=248)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Pervasive Magic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=390" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 219 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

From rivers that charm all who come near to forests that speak through dream messages, you have seen and studied many kinds of magical terrain. The world is so rich in magic that it can affect the land itself, and you have traveled extensively to learn the ways of identifying the oddities of magical terrain wherever it arises.

 Choose two ability boosts. One must be **Constitution** or **Wisdom** and one is a free ability boost.

 You're trained in your choice of [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) or [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) and the [Magical Terrain Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) skill. You gain the [Terrain Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=851) skill feat.
name: Surge Investigator
